note.p: Scottish newspaper manager. Son of Archibald Johnston, merchant of Kelso, and his wife Elisabeth Smith. Printer of the Kelso Chronicle.
Census returns of Scotland 1841 (The National Archives of Scotland: Kelso 3/33), 1851 (Kelso 5/8), 1861 (Kelso 10/2), 1871 (Kelso 10/)
Scotland old parish registers births 793/40 54 Kelso (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed dd Month yyyy)
Scotland statutory deaths 793/13 Kelso (Scotlandspeople.gov.uk, accessed 14 June 2022)
